Examples of objective statements include: "together they travel to England and meet up with Chon Lin to kill Rathbone and get the imperial seal back", "forced to think fast, the producer decides to digitally create an actress ""Simone"" to sub for the star--the first totally believable synthetic actress", and "and for her honor, it will be named 'Paradise-Casino'".
